channel.title: Interesting things schools have
channel.description:
A lot better, the principal of the school bought an old movie theater and I am able to help remodel it, they are turning it into a arcade and indoor paintball, airsoft, and lasertag arena. We started the first day of remodeling today and made some great progress, I will upload the pictures in a bit right now I am getting them off my camera.
When the kids at the school get done with our work, we get to walk over to the place and play(well work right now), all students get in free of charge :D Before we started on it. http://i56.tinypic.com/2l42uc.jpg After the first days work. http://i56.tinypic.com/34ruplh.jpg
You can see our progress ;D? [hr]
Main point of this thread, What interesting things does your school have?

item.title: Interesting things schools have
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

We have a pub down the road so sometimes go for the sneaky quick pint at lunch. Burger van, starbucks, refectory the works:P.

Pub is defo my favorite though although it doesn’t have a pool table.

Read full topic

item.title: Interesting things schools have
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Our administration is fucking awful, I hate it. Our school still has a 98% attendence record and averages 2100 on the SAT, but it’s so easy to skip a class, and plenty of people come in stoned every day. Our lunch has an unmonitored outside patio, and it’s so easy to just slip down a hill and leave.

Read full topic

item.title: Interesting things schools have
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

My school was built on top of a landfill. We r speshul.

We have tennis courts, a football field, and baseball field.

I’m pretty sure we’re no longer an IB school, but I could be wrong. (They took the huge-ass IB poster down in front of the school)

[hr]

reyx7:

I know what school you go to. >=)
I can literally see everything about where you live through that website.

item.title: Interesting things schools have
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

imsuperman05:

Interesting things… We have shitty ass announcements, retard freshman - junior bragging about their ‘swag’ when they look like faggots, Lupe Fiasco was going to perform at our school, but our administration is fucking retarded and didn’t want him to perform here… tons of sluts, and bitches that talk shit.

This. There’s a bunch of mexicans that have stupid fucking hair-do’s. Some buzz their head, but leave a little long hair in the back. Another kid has long hair, except he shaved the sides of his head. They think it’s cool, I think they stole their hair-cuts from a shitty 80’s sci-fi space movie. Holy fucking shit gaiz.

Read full topic

Our administration is retarded with having four to five principals, and the lunch lines need to be remodeled because they extend to the next part of the lunch room (not really, but you would think so if EVERY student lined up there) etc.

item.title: Interesting things schools have
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Our town has practically nowhere to play airsoft and the principal for our school we currently have made everything stupid and strict.

I don’t know how many years ago, but a richer-side woman passed away from our town and left thousands of dollars and specifically said before she passed, “Make sure they use this money to get something for the kids”.

They ended up using it to repair roads and build a caboose in honor of a train that used to run through our town. -.- If we turned this old, crap-smelling gym we have into a building for airsoft, and then converted the area next to it into a small skate park, every kid in this small town would be entertained.

I don’t see what’s so hard about it, we even had a large petition going for the skate park (even though I don’t skate anymore). I hate my town and school, no joke.

Read full topic
